MODDING.ILLEGAL_GLOBAL: Tried to tap into the matrix, did we? Neo might be impressed, but we're not.
MODDING.WEAPON_SPAWN: Yearning for the `${DATA}`, were you? This isn't an armory, and that piece? Still in the forge.
MODDING.BLACKLISTED_COMMAND: I'm sorry, but you do not have permissions to perform this command. Please contact the server administrators if you believe that this is an error.
MODDING.SUSPICIOUS_EXPLOSION: Sorry, but this isn't a Michael Bay film. Excessive use of pyrotechnics is not permitted.
MODDING.HIGH_DISTANCE_DAMAGE: A punch was thrown... somewhere. And yet, bones cracked here. Physics raised an eyebrow, then walked out of the room.
MODDING.ILLEGAL_VEHICLE_MODIFIER: Unlike Dom Toretto from Fast and Furious, we are not family.
MODDING.DAMAGE_MODIFIER: Your power level cannot be over 9000.
MODDING.ADVANCED_NOCLIP: Trying a secret slide through unseen corridors? This isn't a phantom waltz, and that move? Not on our dance card.
MODDING.BAD_ENTITY_SPAWN: Ah, trying to summon the ancient artifact of `${DATA}`, were you? This isn't an episode of Antiques Roadshow, and that relic is staying in the vault.
MODDING.SEMI_GODMODE: Your insistence on the fountain of youth seems to have disrupted the natural flow of time. Eternity isn't as fun as it sounds.
MODDING.FAST_MOVEMENT: Flying is not enabled on this server.
MODDING.INVINCIBILITY: You are not the Black Knight, you may not be invincible.
MODDING.ILLEGAL_FREEZE: While spirits may wander freely, we mere mortals are bound by the laws of physics. Sir Isaac Newton wouldn't have it any other way.
MODDING.ILLEGAL_NATIVE: Tried to whisper to the spirits of the digital realm, did we? Unfortunately, this seance has been denied. Better luck in the ethereal plane.
MODDING.FREECAM: You seem to have had an out of body experience.
MODDING.TELEPORTED: Blink and you're gone? Not in this dimension, traveler.
MODDING.VEHICLE_MODIFICATION: You couldn't find the headlight fluid for your car.
MODDING.ILLEGAL_LOCAL_VEHICLE: Seems like you've found the invisible steed of Lord Mirage! Alas, this mystical ride is reserved for the annual phantom parade.
MODDING.VEHICLE_SPAWN: Ah, dreaming of a joyride with `${DATA}`, were you? This isn't a showroom, and that particular model? It's on an eternal waitlist!
MODDING.RUNTIME_TEXTURE: Mod menu you have, use it you may not.
MODDING.CLEAR_TASKS: This is not a Jedi mind trick training center. Your efforts to influence the free will of others has been noted... and rejected.
MODDING.SPECTATING: Ghostly specters are reserved for haunted mansions, not here. Your astral projection skills were noted, but not welcomed.
MODDING.PED_CHANGE: Identity theft is not a joke, Jim! Millions of characters suffer every year.
MODDING.HONEYPOT: You attempted to toggle your creative mode, but didn't have the permissions to do so.
MODDING.ILLEGAL_EVENT_USAGE: The fabric of existence twitched for a moment, like a badly stitched quilt unraveling at the edges. But don't worry, we've patched that little anomaly... by removing the needle.
MODDING.HANDLING_FIELD: Looks like you tried to turbocharge the laws of physics. Nice try, but in this world, we keep our wheels grounded in reality.
MODDING.INVALID_HEALTH: Your health bar seems to have had a bit too much of spinach, Popeye
MODDING.INFINITE_AMMO: Despite popular belief, the laws of conservation do apply here. The magic ammunition pouch has been confiscated.
MODDING.ILLEGAL_DAMAGE: The scales of power were tilted too far in your favor, disrupting the balance of our realm.
MODDING.TEXT_ENTRY: Inspecting Element is not permitted on this browser.
MODDING.PED_SPAWN: Ah, hoping to beckon the legendary figure of `${DATA}`, were you? This isn't a Hollywood casting, and that star is staying off-stage.

TIMEOUT_BYPASS.PED_ROBBING: Excessive ped-robbing! (Bypassed server-timeout, most likely using an injector to accomplish this.)
TIMEOUT_BYPASS.ZOMBIE_LOOTING: Excessive zombie looting! (Bypassed server-timeout, most likely using an injector to accomplish this.)

INJECTION.CLIENT_EVENT: Ah, trying to tune into the hidden frequency of `${DATA}`, were you? This isn't a secret radio station, and that song's not on our playlist.
INJECTION.HONEYPOT_NATIVE: Oh, bother! It seems you've stumbled into a place where honey wasn't meant to be found. Some pots are best left alone, no matter how tempting they may seem.
INJECTION.SERVER_EVENT: Wished to dance to the unheard rhythm of `${DATA}`, did we? This isn't a secret ballroom, and those dance moves? Strictly not allowed.
INJECTION.INCOMPATIBLE_PROGRAM: Attempted to duet with a mysterious backstage process, did we? The orchestra checked the guest list, and that tune wasn't authorized.

ILLEGAL_VALUES.PED_OBJECT: Attempting to add a ped object not in the 'allowed' list of ped objects.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.PROP_ITEM_ID: Player attempted to use a prop item with an illegal item id.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.SECURITY_CAMERAS: Attempting to tamper with illegal security cameras.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.LIGHTER_ITEM_ID: Attempting to use a lighter item with an illegal item id.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.RAW_PED_OBJECT: Attempting to add a raw ped object without proper permissions.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.PAWN_SHOP: Attempting to pass values for a pawn shop that doesn't exist.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.RADIO_FREQUENCY: Attempting to access illegal radio frequencies.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.BURGER_SHOT_DELIVERY_ITEM_ID: Attempting to use a burger shot delivery item with an illegal item id.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.BOOMBOX_ITEM_ID: Attempting to use a boombox item with an illegal item id.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.FIRE_EXTINGUISHER_MODEL: Attempted to delete a fire extinguisher on all clients with a model that wasn't a fire extinguisher.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.EXTERNAL_SOUND_EFFECT: Attempted to tell other clients to play an external audio without proper permissions.
ILLEGAL_VALUES.WEATHER_NAME: Attempting to use a weather spell with an illegal weather name.

MEDIOCRE.BAD_PHONE_MESSAGE: Attempted to create a possibly bad phone message: "${DATA}"
MEDIOCRE.BAD_Y_POST: Attempted to create a possibly bad y post: "${DATA}"
MEDIOCRE.BAD_PED_MESSAGE: Attempted to create a possibly bad ped message: "${DATA}"
MEDIOCRE.BAD_CHAT_MESSAGE: Attempted to post a possibly bad message in the OOC chat: "${DATA}"
MEDIOCRE.BAD_Y_ACCOUNT: Attempted to create a possibly bad y account: "${DATA}"

PEPEGA.MODERATE: You have been banned from OP-FW without any specified reasons.
PEPEGA.ULTIMATE: You have been banned from this server.
